sentences.en: At last he began his inaugural address, his voice ringing out in the frosty air.
sentences.cn: 最后他开始发表就职演说, 他的声音在寒冷的空气中回荡.

sentences.en: Davey Boy Smith beating Owen Hart to become the inaugural champion.
sentences.cn: 达维男孩史密斯击败欧文赫德成为首届冠军.

sentences.en: Entries open on Monday 15 October for the inaugural FuturArc Prize.
sentences.cn: 《名筑》大奖赛将在10月15日正式拉开帷幕.

sentences.en: His arrival for the inaugural ceremonies would be triumphal.
sentences.cn: 他将以胜利者的姿态参加落成典礼.

sentences.en: His inaugural speech was very inspiring.
sentences.cn: 他的就职演说很鼓动人心.

sentences.en: How many people participated in the inaugural ceremony?
sentences.cn: 多少人参加了开幕典礼?

sentences.en: In his inaugural address, Thomas Jefferson warned of entangling alliances.
sentences.cn: 托马斯-杰斐逊在他的就职演说中告诫咱们结盟的危害.

sentences.en: Only they could decide the winner of the inaugural omelette World Cup.
sentences.cn: 对于“煎蛋世界杯”来说,他们就是最高权威.

sentences.en: Poor Theatre Series 2010 – The inaugural Playwrights'Boot Camp is here!
sentences.cn: 勒紧腰带系列2010–前所未有的编剧操练营来了!

sentences.en: Professor Pearson gave the inaugural lecture in the new lecture theatre.
sentences.cn: 皮尔逊教授在新的阶梯讲堂发表了启用演说.

sentences.en: the inaugural lecture of the new Professor of American Literature
sentences.cn: 新来的美国文学教授讲的第一堂课

sentences.en: We have built strong relationships since our inaugural meeting in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 北京会谈以来,我们建立起坚实的合作伙伴关系.

sentences.en: We listened to the President's inaugural speech on the radio yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我们通过无线电听了总统的就职演说.

sentences.en: When Nixon secluded himself again to work on his inaugural address, the situation changed.
sentences.cn: 当尼克松又闭门写他的就职演说时, 情况发生了变化.

sentences.en: You ought to get them to run that inaugural speech by me.
sentences.cn: 你应该叫他们把就职演说给我搞吧.

words.tran_cn: 就职典礼；开始，开创；开幕式
创新；开辟；开创；举行开幕典礼；举行就职典礼
开始的；开幕的；就任的，就职的

trans.tran_cn: 就职的，就任的，创始的，最早的
trans.tran_en: an inaugural speech is the first given by someone who is starting an important job
